original_title: This is Paris: 50 Years of Passion
overview: This is Paris: 50 years of passion immerses you on the heat of Paris Saint-Germain, the most successful club in France, during the end of the 2019/20 season marked by the COVID crisis, with an heroic sporting career in the Champions League. Immersed with Mbappe, Neymar, Kimpembe, Thiago Silva, Marquinhos and the whole team, this film paints an intimate and powerful portrait of these football stars.
title: This is Paris: 50 Years of Passion
